mapper.insert: insert into club(clubid, clubadmin, ispublic,clubthumbnail,description) values(#{clubid}, #{clubadmin},${ispublic}, #{clubthumbnail}, #{description})
mapper.select: select no, clubid, clubadmin, clubpost, clubmember, clubnotice, date_format(createdate,'%Y.%m.%d') createdate, clubthumbnail,description,ispublic from club where no in (select clubno from clubmember where userid=#{param1})
select no, clubid, clubadmin, clubpost, clubmember, clubnotice, date_format(createdate,'%Y.%m.%d') createdate, clubthumbnail,description,ispublic from club where no=${param1}
select no ,clubid, clubadmin from club where clubadmin =#{param1} and clubid=#{param2}

select no, clubid, clubadmin, clubpost, clubmember, date_format(createdate,'%Y-%m-%d') createdate ,description, ispublic from club where ispublic=${param1} || clubid in (select clubid from clubmember where userid=#{param2})

select no, clubid, clubadmin, clubpost, clubmember, clubnotice, date_format(createdate,'%Y-%m-%d') createdate, clubthumbnail,description,ispublic from club where no=(select clubno from clubmember where userid=#{param1} and clubno=${param2})
mapper.update: update club set clubpost = (select count(no) from review where clubno = #{param1}) where no=${parma1}
update club set clubmember = (select count(no) from clubmember where clubno = #{param1}) where no=${parma1}
mapper.insert: insert into clubinvite(userid, username, clubno, clubid, invite, submit, complete) values(#{userid}, #{username}, ${clubno}, #{clubid}, ${invite}, ${submit}, ${complete})
mapper.select: select no , userid, username, clubno, clubid, invite, submit, complete, date_format(createdate,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s') createdate from clubinvite where clubno=#{param1} and invite=${param2} and complete=false
select count(clubid) from club where clubid=#{param1}
